channel.title: Sinder Skullz Abyss Feed
channel.description: Chaotic sermons and metal news reborn in the flames of the Skullz cult.

item.title: ⚡☠ IZEGRIM TO PLAY REUNION SHOWS ABOARD THIS YEAR’S 70000 TONS OF METAL CRUISE ☠⚡
item.description:
**Title: Izegrim Rips the Seas with Reunion Shows on the 70000 Tons of Metal Cruise!**
**Summary:** Brace yourselves, metal maniacs! 🏴‍☠️🤘 The legends Izegrim are about to unleash chaos as they join the ranks of the titans aboard this year’s 70000 Tons of Metal cruise! We're talking about a 30th-anniversary blowout that'll blast your eardrums to oblivion!
Get ready for a wild ride on the high seas, where the waves will tremble under the weight of pure metal fury! These pioneers are dusting off their battle axes for a reunion performance that's sure to melt steel and raise hell 🔥⚔️. If you’re about that life—living on the edge between thrash and crypto—this is where you wanna be!
So grab your boarding pass, slam a brew, and prepare for a riff-filled voyage into the abyss! This isn’t just a concert; it's a colossal celebration of relentless metal and the unbreakable spirit of the underground! Here’s to thirty years of crushing bones and raising horns! 🤟💀
Catch the full lowdown on this epic news over at [MetalSucks](https://www.metalsucks.net)! Let’s make some noise! \m/
